verses.verse: And you has he quickened, who were dead<WG3498> in trespasses<WG3900> and sins;<WG266>

Wherein<WG1722> <WG3757> in time<WG4218> past you walked<WG4043> according<WG2596> to the course<WG165> of this<WG5127> world,<WG2889> according<WG2596> to the prince<WG758> of the power<WG1849> of the air,<WG109> the spirit<WG4151> that now<WG3568> works<WG1754> in the children<WG5207> of disobedience:<WG543>

Among<WG1722> whom<WG3739> also<WG2532> we all<WG3956> had our conversation<WG390> in times<WG4218> past in the lusts<WG1939> of our flesh,<WG4561> fulfilling<WG4160> the desires<WG2307> of the flesh<WG4561> and of the mind;<WG1271> and were by nature<WG5449> the children<WG5043> of wrath,<WG3709> even<WG2532> as others.<WG3062>
But God,<WG2316> who is rich<WG4145> in mercy,<WG1656> for his great<WG4183> love<WG26> with which<WG3739> he loved<WG25> us,
Even<WG2532> when we were dead<WG3498> in sins,<WG3900> has quickened<WG4806> us together<WG4806> with Christ,<WG5547> (by grace<WG5485> you are saved;<WG4982>)
And has raised<WG4891> us up together,<WG4891> and made<WG4776> us sit<WG4776> together<WG4776> in heavenly<WG2032> places in Christ<WG5547> Jesus:<WG2424>

That in the ages<WG165> to come<WG1904> he might show<WG1731> the exceeding<WG5235> riches<WG4149> of his grace<WG5485> in his kindness<WG5544> toward<WG1909> us through<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
For by grace<WG5485> are you saved<WG4982> through<WG1223> faith;<WG4102> and that not of yourselves:<WG5216> it is the gift<WG1435> of God:<WG2316>
Not of works,<WG2041> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> any<WG5100> man should boast.<WG2744>

For we are his workmanship,<WG4161> created<WG2936> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> to good<WG18> works,<WG2041> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> has before<WG4282> ordained<WG4282> that we should walk<WG4043> in them.

Why<WG1352> remember,<WG3421> that you being in time<WG4218> past Gentiles<WG1484> in the flesh,<WG4561> who<WG3588> are called<WG3004> Uncircumcision<WG203> by that which<WG3588> is called<WG3004> the Circumcision<WG4061> in the flesh<WG4561> made<WG5499> by hands;<WG5499>

That at<WG1722> that time<WG2540> you were without<WG5565> Christ,<WG5547> being aliens<WG526> from the commonwealth<WG4174> of Israel,<WG2474> and strangers<WG3581> from the covenants<WG1242> of promise,<WG1860> having<WG2192> no<WG3361> hope,<WG1680> and without<WG112> God<WG112> in the world:<WG2889>
But now<WG3570> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> you who<WG3739> sometimes<WG4218> were far<WG3112> off<WG3112> are made<WG1096> near<WG1451> by the blood<WG129> of Christ.<WG5547>
For he is our peace,<WG1515> who<WG3739> has made<WG4160> both<WG297> one,<WG1520> and has broken<WG3089> down the middle<WG3320> wall of partition<WG5418> between us;

Having abolished<WG2673> in his flesh<WG4561> the enmity,<WG2189> even the law<WG3551> of commandments<WG1785> contained in ordinances;<WG1378> for to make<WG2936> in himself<WG1438> of two<WG1417> one<WG1520> new<WG2537> man,<WG444> so making<WG4160> peace;<WG1515>
And that he might reconcile<WG604> both<WG297> to God<WG2316> in one<WG1520> body<WG4983> by the cross,<WG4716> having slain<WG615> the enmity<WG2189> thereby:<WG1722>
And came<WG2064> and preached<WG2097> peace<WG1515> to you which<WG3588> were afar<WG3112> off, and to them that were near.<WG1451>
For through<WG1223> him we both<WG297> have<WG2192> access<WG4318> by one<WG1520> Spirit<WG4151> to the Father.<WG3962>
Now<WG3767> therefore<WG686> you are no<WG3765> more<WG3765> strangers<WG3581> and foreigners,<WG3941> but fellow citizens<WG4847> with the saints,<WG40> and of the household<WG3609> of God;<WG2316>
And are built<WG2026> on the foundation<WG2310> of the apostles<WG652> and prophets,<WG4396> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> himself<WG848> being<WG5607> the chief<WG204> corner<WG204> stone;
In whom<WG3739> all<WG3956> the building<WG3619> fitly<WG4883> framed<WG4883> together<WG4883> grows<WG837> to an holy<WG40> temple<WG3485> in the Lord:<WG2962>
In whom<WG3739> you also<WG2532> are built<WG4925> together<WG4925> for an habitation<WG2732> of God<WG2316> through<WG1722> the Spirit.<WG4151>
